channel.title: Guitar Help
channel.description:
Anyone know what equipment Jimmy Paige might be using to get this tone/sound on his guitar???
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JEqYI1lApQY[/url] The part is 4:28 - 5:20

item.title: Guitar Help
item.dc:creator: GuitarJim
item.description:
It’s a wah pedal I think, it depends on where you put it in the loop on how it sounds. Try it before distortion & other effects and after to see the difference and maybe get a bit closer to replicating the sound.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Help
item.dc:creator: rufus83
item.description:
KurtyBird:

Anyone know what equipment Jimmy Paige might be using to get this tone/sound on his guitar???

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JEqYI1lApQY
The part is 4:28 - 5:20

Other than the distortion and effects. I’m sure the sound your hearing is a “slide”. It’s a little glass or metal tube you put over your finger that takes away the fret noise when moving between frets. Metal ones also adds a bit of high end shrill to the notes.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Help
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
I hear some Electric Echo and obvious Distortion and Reverb. Sounds like he turns adds some effect – probably a special setting on his amplifier.

It’s Led-Zeppelin; he is probably just using his Led-Zeppelin guitar magic, don’t question it.

Read full topic
